channel.title: Fallout?
channel.description:
hey guys.
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/fallout-3-mod[/url]
what do you BMS fans think about this Fallout 1 total conversion mod?
Will it stay alive?
How long do you think it'll take to be released?
Personally I think it can and probably will be done. The only thing is that the maps won't be too fun because they are probably all walled off like they would be in Fallout 1. (wich is fine by me)
(there is a video if you want to see it on the page)

item.title: Fallout?
item.dc:creator: punisher1565
item.description:
yeah, I thought that if it wasn’t related to BMS, it had to be in the ladies club. Srry, guys. I’m a total forum noob/troll. w.e. you wanna call it. At least I admit it

Mr. Someguy:

Is this a FO1 mod for FO3 or an FO3 mod for FO1?

(It’s a FO3 mod that will convert FO1)

…

I think this guy (whom is making the FO1 conversion mod) needs more modders or something. Like the team who is remaking wolfenstein 3d for the source engine.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout?
item.dc:creator: Spycrabz
item.description:
Pokemon Eater:

It’ll take many, many years for it to be released. It’s going to be the Black Mesa of Fallout mods.

Also, this thread should be moved to gaming.

Also x2, how the hell did everybody reach Alien Grunt?

Shitposting.

Read full topic

item.description:
If this happens…my head will asplode in pure win.

item.title: Fallout?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Is this a FO1 mod for FO3 or an FO3 mod for FO1?

Pokemon Eater:

Also x2, how the hell did everybody reach Alien Grunt?

Xenian losses on Earth have been very heavy, so in an emergency effort the Nihilanth has decided to increase the number of Alien Grunts sent over.
